issue.title: moviesjoy.cx
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://moviesjoy.cx/episode/the-x-files-season-1-episode-13/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmoviesjoy.cx%2Fepisode%2Fthe-x-files-season-1-episode-13%2F) ### Comment > When you click on the video to play/pause the video, the pop-up blocker keeps showing the message that pop-ups were prevented. > Could these be gotten rid of instead of the message showing all the time. Username: `@TesterMan247` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/m9lkergf628s0o0c8k8k8ko8gw0sow8kllper6ljk0.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.0 Beta 2 (4928) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.22000.0 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Annoyances:

AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,

Other:

AdGuard Extra (Beta) (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)
AdGuard Popup Blocker (Beta) (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js) Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://moviesjoy.cx/serie/the-x-files-1993/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmoviesjoy.cx%2Fserie%2Fthe-x-files-1993%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&clid=syhUmk--3qa0Y7--OjGUV7&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=false&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Fbeta%2Fassistant%2F4.3%2Fassistant.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Fbeta%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Fbeta%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.5.11.18.19.20.21.207&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.20.0+Beta+2+%284928%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fmoviesjoy.cx%2Fserie%2Fthe-x-files-1993%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.enabled=false&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.22000.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F132.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=win&win.wfp=true)
